title: MeasurementValue
description: The measurement value for a specific size

size.description: The size with which the value is associated

value.description: The single value associated with a size (whether this or `min_value` and `max_value` will be present)

min_value.description: The lower boundary of the value range (whether this and `max_value` or `value` will be present)

max_value.description: The upper boundary of the value range (whether this and `min_value` or `value` will be present)
